name: Cosmo.
description:
A minimalistic game with black & white design style.

Pick up artifacts, be strong !

Insane combos !

Destroy Asteroids !

Beware of Black Holes !

Infinite Gameplay, and many various mechanics !

And more stuffs ! Play, if you want to know, what i am mean... =)

Contact with me, if you found bugs / errors.

Enjoy with Release 1.0.0 !

☼

P.S. To open help in main menu, press F1.
